thread.title: Employee Navigator and United Benefit Advisors Announce Partnership
thread.title_full: Employee Navigator and United Benefit Advisors Announce Partnership

author: admin
title: Employee Navigator and United Benefit Advisors Announce Partnership
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 7:15 AM   Employee Navigator 
GAITHERSBURG, Md. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Employee Navigator, a rapidly growing provider of benefits, HR and compliance software, has formed a partnership with United Benefit Advisors (UBA) ( www.UBAbenefits.com ), the nation’s largest independent employee benefit advisory organizations. UBA’s 200 offices, located in major markets across the country, will have access to an array of capabilities ranging from traditional benefits administration to ACA compliance reporting and time off tracking. UBA joins a rapidly growing list of brokers who have chosen Employee Navigator as their preferred software provider, with the platform already supporting more than 8,000 companies and 800,000 employees throughout the country. 
Employee Navigator CEO George Reese remarked, “Not only is United Benefit Advisors one of the largest employee benefit advisory organizations in the country, they are also considered one of our industry’s premiere thought leaders. While we’re excited about the partnership growing our footprint in this rapidly moving environment we’re equally enthusiastic about having a new partner that we can learn from and who will undoubtedly play a role in the continued development of our product.” 
“We are thrilled to endorse Employee Navigator as a UBA Certified Solution,” said Paul Zumbrook, Senior Vice President, Partner Relations at United Benefit Advisors. "Employee Navigator’s leading edge technology, combined with the insightful and personalized service of UBA's local Partner Firms, will help thousands of people manage, shop and enroll in essential benefits.” 
About Employee Navigator 
Employee Navigator is one of the fastest growing SaaS-based benefits and HR platforms in the United States. The platform provides brokers and their clients with a single place to manage everything from new hire onboarding and online enrollments to ACA Reporting and time off tracking. Employee Navigator’s highly customizable software is currently being used by some of the nation’s leading insurance brokers, TPA’s and carriers. For more information, visit www.employeenavigator.com or follow Employee Navigator on Twitter: @EmployeeNav . 
About United Benefit Advisors 
United Benefit Advisors® (UBA) is the nation’s leading independent employee benefits advisory organization with more than 200 offices throughout the United States, Canada and the United Kingdom. Our goal is to provide an environment that empowers our more than 2,000 Partners to both maintain their individuality and to pool their expertise, insight, and market presence to provide best-in-class services. Employers, advisors and industry-related organizations interested in obtaining powerful results from the shared wisdom of our Partners should visit UBA online at www.UBAbenefits.com .
